Entries.{{ModId}}_teenbeachmovie/Season fall/Tim: continue/93 17/farmer 94 10 2 Sam 91 18 1 Sebastian 92 17 1 Abigail 95 18 3 EdwinPayne -1000 -1000 0 CharlesRowland -999 -999 0/skippable/changeToTemporaryMap {{ModId}}_LighthouseScary/pause 2000/textAboveHead Sam "...but she was already dead!"/move farmer 0 6 2/speak Abigail "Oh, come on. That story wouldn't even scare a *baby*."/pause 2000/speak Abigail "@! you're just in time for our annual scary story bonfire night."/speak Sam "Go on, Abigail, you tell one then."/speak Abigail "Alright. Don't say I didn't warn you!"/end

Entries.{{ModId}}_crystalhearts4/f CrystalPalace: continue/x y/farmer x y z CrystalPalace x y z/skippable/animate CrystalPalace psychicing/move farmer x y z/emote farmer ?/question null "#..Crystal?#(Say nothing.)"/animate CrystalPalace stop meditating/speak CrystalPalace "@! I knew you would be here. I saw it in a vision."/question null "#That's awesome.#How did you know I was coming?#I don't believe you."/speak CrystalPalace "I'm a psychic medium. Want me to do a reading?#$b#I promise I won't look at anything private."/question fork0 "Let Crystal read your mind?#Yes#No"/fork PsychicDenial/end
Entries.PsychicDenial: speak CrystalPalace "Oh... okay, that's fine. We can do something else instead.#$b#Do you watch Murder After Dark? I've been dying to talk about last night's cliffhanger."/pause 1000/end

Entries.{{ModId}}_Seance/HostMail {{ModId}}_Sean: junimoKart_ghostMusic/46 90/farmer 46 92 0 CharlesRowland 46 88 2 EdwinPayne 43 90 1 CrystalPalace 49 91 3/broadcastEvent true/skippable/setSkipActions removeQuest {{ModId}}_SeanceInvitationQuest/changeToTemporaryMap {{ModId}}_SeanceMap/globalFadeToClear 0.007/pause 1000/speak EdwinPayne "{{i18n:Seance.0}}"/question null "{{i18n:Seance.1}}"/pause 1000/speak CharlesRowland "{{i18n:Seance.2}}"/pause 500/speak CrystalPalace "{{i18n:Seance.3}}"/speak EdwinPayne "{{i18n:Seance.4}}"/pause 1000/warp EdwinPayne 0 1 true/temporaryAnimatedSprite Characters\EdwinPayneBrownJacket 0 288 32 32 360 2 9999 43 89 false false 1 0.0 1 0 0 0/speak EdwinPayne "{{i18n:Seance.5}}"/pause 2000/speak CrystalPalace "{{i18n:Seance.6}}"/pause 2000/screenshake 5 3/glow 255 255 255 false/temporaryAnimatedSprite Characters\Monsters\Ghost 0 0 16 24 500 4 9999 46 89 false false 5 0.0007 1 0 0 0/removeSprite 43 89/warp EdwinPayne 43 90/beginSimultaneousCommand/emote farmer 16/jump farmer 8/jump EdwinPayne 8/jump CharlesRowland 8/jump CrystalPalace 8/endSimultaneousCommand/pause 1000/speak CharlesRowland "{{i18n:Seance.7}}"/speak CharlesRowland "{{i18n:Seance.8}}"/playSound ghost/startJittering/pause 500/speak EdwinPayne "{{i18n:Seance.9}}"/speak CrystalPalace "{{i18n:Seance.10}}"/pause 500/removeTemporarySprites/temporaryAnimatedSprite Characters\Monsters\Ghost 0 96 16 24 120 4 1 46 89 false false 1 0.007 1 0 0 0/speak CrystalPalace "{{i18n:Seance.11}}"/stopJittering/pause 300/speak CharlesRowland "{{i18n:Seance.12}}"/speak EdwinPayne "{{i18n:Seance.13}}"/pause 2000/speak CharlesRowland "{{i18n:Seance.14}}"/removeQuest {{ModId}}_SeanceInvitationQuest/mail {{ModId}}_SeanceIngredients/end
Entries.{{ModId}}_Seance2/HostMail {{ModId}}_Sea: junimoKart_ghostMusic/46 90/farmer 46 92 0 CharlesRowland 46 88 2 EdwinPayne 43 90 1 CrystalPalace 49 91 3 NikoSasaki 3 3 2/broadcastEvent true/skippable/setSkipActions AddMail Host {{ModId}}_NikoCured received/changeToTemporaryMap {{ModId}}_SeanceMap/globalFadeToClear 0.007/pause 1000/speak EdwinPayne "Is everyone ready?#$b#There may be unexpected consequences to performing the strenghtening ritual. We ought to be on our guard."/speak CharlesRowland "Got my bat ready, mate.$u"/speak CrystalPalace "Let's bring this ghost home."/speak EdwinPayne "Very well. Let us begin."/pause 1000/warp EdwinPayne 0 1 true/temporaryAnimatedSprite Characters\EdwinPayneBrownJacket 0 288 32 32 360 2 9999 43 89 false false 1 0.0 1 0 0 0/speak EdwinPayne "I am addressing the spirit who haunts the Pelican Town graveyard.#$b#The spell I am currently performing will allow you to anchor yourself to the town so that we may speak."/speak CharlesRowland "If you reach out, we can help you, yeah?"/pause 2000/screenshake 5 3/glow 255 255 255 false/temporaryAnimatedSprite Characters\Monsters\Ghost 0 0 16 24 500 4 9999 46 89 false false 5 0.0 1 0 0 0/playSound ghost/speak CrystalPalace "It's working! I can feel that she's stronger now.$u"/speak CharlesRowland "She? Can you ask her who she is?"/speak EdwinPayne "Charles, Crystal, @! I sense that our ritual has attracted unwanted attention!"/spawn ghosts/beginSimultaneousCommand/faceDirection CrystalPalace 1/faceDirection CharlesRowland 1/faceDirection farmer 1/viewport move 4 0 2000/pause 1000/playSound ghost/playSound ghost/playSound ghost/jump farmer 8/speak CharlesRowland "@ and I will hold them off. Crystal, Edwin, keep anchoring the ghost!"/warp CharlesRowland 2 2/temporaryAnimatedSprite Characters\CharlesRowlandBlackJacket 0 256 32 32 250 3 999 46 88 false false 5 0.0 1 0 0 0/warp CharlesRowland 1 1/showFrame farmer 34/pause 2000/playSound ghost/faceDirection CrystalPalace 3/speak CrystalPalace "Please! Tell us who you are so we can help you!$u"/removeSprite 46 89/screenshake 5 3/glow 255 255 255 false/warp CharlesRowland 46 88/warp EdwinPayne 43 90/removeTemporarySprites/warp NikoSasaki 46 89/faceDirection CharlesRowland 2/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection CrystalPalace 3/faceDirection EdwinPaye 1/beginSimultaneousCommand/jump farmer 8/ jump EdwinPayne 8/jump CharlesRowland 8/jump CrystalPalace 8/endSimultaneousCommand/pause 2000/speak CrystalPalace "...$u#$b#...Niko?$s#$b#Oh my god, Niko!$h"/faceDirection NikoSasaki 1/speak NikoSasaki "You guys found me!"/speak EdwinPayne "How is this possible?$s#$b#You... you became a ghost after dying? But after you died... we didn't see your ghost at Esther Finch's house...$s"/pause 1000/speak NikoSasaki "I'd really love to tell you guys the whole story, but that ritual was exhausting."/speak CrystalPalace "You're right. We're just happy you're back. The whole story can wait."/speak NikoSasaki "Thanks, guys.$h#$b#And you made a new friend!"/faceDirection NikoSasaki 2/speak NikoSasaki "Did you help bring me back? Thank you!$h"/speak CharlesRowland "Yeah, @ was a huge help. We couldn't have brought you back without ${him^her^them}$!$h#$b#We'd better get you all home, though. It's pretty late."/speak EdwinPayne "Yes, we shall speak another day. Good night, everyone."/action AddMail Host {{ModId}}_NikoCured received/end
Entries.{{ModId}}_montyhearts1/Friendship MontyF: continue/99 92/farmer 95 93 1 MontyFinch 1000 1000 2/skippable/move farmer 5 0 1 true/pause 3000/playSound doorClose/warp MontyFinch 101 90/move MontyFinch 0 3 3/pause 800/animate MontyFinch false false falldown/jump farmer 6/emote MontyFinch 16/speak MontyFinch "Sorry! You're the new farmer, @, right? I didn't see you there, haha."/animate MontyFinch false false getup/showFrame MontyFinch holdbooks/speak MontyFinch "I was just checking out some books about astrology."/quickQuestion #Astrology? You know that stuff is all made up, right?#Astrology? What's your star sign?#That's nice.(break)speak MontyFinch "So what? It's fun to learn about, and you can't argue that it has some truth to it."(break)speak MontyFinch "I'm a Pisces!$h"(break)speak MontyFinch "Yeah, right now I'm reading this book about how your rising sign influences your love life.$blush"/speak MontyFinch "Anyway, I have to go. Sorry again for running into you!"/move MontyFinch -10 0 3/hurry MontyFinch/faceDirection farmer 3/temporaryAnimatedSprite feathersfloatdown/emote farmer 24/pause 2000/end
